reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 12

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 12

bcl:section.bcl:text: Transfers to 0855436 B.C. Ltd. of the properties described below are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: District Lot 2330, Rupert District as shown on Plan VIP87482, PID 028-289-234
Block F, District Lot 2110, Rupert District as shown on Plan VIP87482, PID 028-289-218
District Lot 2329, Rupert District as shown on Plan VIP87482, PID 028-289-226

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to August 3, 2010, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37]
